name: Real-time Racing Manager
description:
Real-time Racing Manager is a game focused on dynamic race strategy experience.

Try different setups during practice session to get the most of your cars. Pick a right moment to send your drivers out to get the best qualifying lap. Define optimal race strategy, deal with changing weather and track conditions and guide your team to race victory.

Between races invest in car development, hire drivers and sign sponsors.

  • 20 different tracks
  • 3 levels of competitions
  • 18 racing teams
  • 50+ drivers

Note: You can pay here 2$ for an ad-free version. Head over to Google Play Store to get a free version that does contain ads.
